text:

name: sfchronicle
text: Black Christmas decorations remind me, and other Black folks, of home, of a happy Black household, writes @JustMrPhillips. It’s something we long for while living in a region where we see so few others who look like us. https://t.co/XwCOMxIDEY

text:
